description: A whole side of salmon makes a stunning, popular centrepiece at a party or buffet, and is really simple to prepare.
keywords: Roast Side Of Salmon With Cucumber & Dill Salad
name: Roast Side Of Salmon With Cucumber & Dill Salad Recipe | Woolworths
